title: Cats, Dogs, Forced air, Electric, Tile, Carpet, All Inclusive
posting_body: Cats, Dogs, Forced air, Electric, Tile, Carpet, All Inclusive & allowed in this SingleFamily, Approximately 1,200 square Feet, featuring modern Appliances, fixtures and Finishes, Convenient living within easy reach.
Schools, shopping centers, dining and entertainment options are a short distance from home!
Beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home located in Southaven, MS.
Home is complete with a spacious living area and fireplace, stainless steal appliances, Laundry room, and garage.
This home is pet friendly, but breed restrictions may apply, 1,200 sqft home in Southaven!
Open kitchen concept with updated counters and a spacious living room.
Spacious backyard, great for family gatherings!
Pets accepted on a case by case basis
The new standard of living starts at Southaven, MS, This homes is conveniently located near to the heart of the historic district, easy access to everything Southaven, has to offer!
Located in a community for good homes and new construction homes, With three different elevations to choose from, you will notice a completely different look and feel.
If you have pets, not only do we allow them, but we have homes available that include a fenced in yard!
